name: v0.5.0 - MCP Server Store & Agent Integration
body:
# MCP Server Store & Agent Integration

This release introduces full MCP (Model Context Protocol) support, enabling agents to connect to external services through a standardized protocol. Inspired by [Salesforce's MCP announcement](https://developer.salesforce.com/blogs/2025/06/introducing-mcp-support-across-salesforce).

## âœ¨ New Features

### MCP Server Store
- **Marketplace UI**: Browse and install MCP servers from a curated store
- **Category Navigation**: Organized by CRM, DevOps, Integration, Communication, Productivity, Storage, AI, Analytics
- **One-Click Install**: Install servers with credential configuration
- **Health Monitoring**: Real-time health status for all installed servers

### Pre-Seeded MCP Servers
- **Salesforce DX** - Salesforce CLI and development tools
- **Salesforce Heroku** - Heroku platform management
- **Salesforce MuleSoft** - API and integration platform
- **Slack** - Team communication and messaging
- **GitHub** - Repository and code management
- **Linear** - Issue tracking and project management
- **Notion** - Workspace and documentation
- **Google Drive** - Cloud storage and documents

### Agent MCP Integration
- **Per-Agent Bindings**: Connect specific MCP servers to individual agents
- **Tool Allowlist/Denylist**: Fine-grained control over which tools each agent can access
- **Priority Ordering**: Control tool resolution order across multiple servers
- **Schema Discovery**: Automatic tool schema fetching and caching

### Backend Infrastructure
- **MCPClientService**: HTTP and SSE transport protocol support
- **MCPRegistryService**: Store management and installation handling
- **Health Checking**: Periodic health monitoring with status tracking
- **Invocation Logging**: Full audit trail for MCP tool calls
- **Credential Encryption**: Secure storage of API keys and tokens

## ğŸ”§ Technical Details

### New API Endpoints
```
# MCP Server Store
GET    /mcp/registry                    - List servers in store
GET    /mcp/registry/categories         - List categories
GET    /mcp/registry/:serverId          - Server details

# Tenant Installations
GET    /mcp/installations               - List installed servers
POST   /mcp/installations               - Install server
PUT    /mcp/installations/:id           - Update config
DELETE /mcp/installations/:id           - Uninstall
POST   /mcp/installations/:id/health    - Health check
POST   /mcp/installations/:id/refresh   - Refresh schema

# Agent MCP Bindings (via AgentDO)
GET    /agents/:agentId/mcp-servers     - List bindings
POST   /agents/:agentId/mcp-servers     - Add binding
PUT    /agents/:agentId/mcp-servers/:id - Update binding
DELETE /agents/:agentId/mcp-servers/:id - Remove binding
```

### Database Schema
- `mcp_server_registry` - Global server catalog
- `mcp_server_categories` - Category organization
- `mcp_server_installations` - Tenant-specific installations
- `mcp_tool_invocations` - Audit logging
- `agent_mcp_servers` (AgentDO) - Per-agent bindings

### Authentication Types Supported
- None (public servers)
- API Key
- Bearer Token
- OAuth 2.0 (infrastructure ready, flows in Phase 5)
